import s from '../Pizza/StylePizza/pizza.module.css' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import React from "react"; const Sous = (props) => { let BuyItem return (
{props.sous.map(u =>
{u.name}
{u.cost} грн
{u.structure}
{ props.buy(props.sous[u.id - 33], props.sous[u.id - 33].cost) } }> Замовити
< /NavLink>
) }
) } export default Sous;
